channel.title: Authors on Niklas Reinmuth
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Niklas Reinmuth

item.description: I’ve been passionate about computers and technology as far as I can remember. Everything started one christmas, when I was a little boy and my parents had given me a Nintendo 64. Computer games and soccer sparked my interest in competition and continuous improvement - two attributes that still greatly benefit me in my daily professional life. Providing value and making things as comfortable as possible for the people I work with and for are the goals I strive to achieve on a daily basis.
